message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you and worth the investment.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob. However, the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $8,500. How about we meet at $8,800?
